content: AI: As an AI language model, I don't have access to current events or predictions of future policies or events. However, it's important for manufacturers to stay informed about relevant policies and regulations that could potentially impact their industry. This way, they can take proactive steps to mitigate any negative effects and also take advantage of any opportunities that arise. Manufacturers can stay informed by following industry news sources, attending conferences and events, and engaging with relevant trade associations and advocacy groups. This can help them stay ahead of any upcoming policies or changes in the industry.
